title: Ticket #2404: Parameter to enable VNC console for VM Universe jobs
description: src/condor_vm-gahp/libvirt_simple_script.awk currently enables the textual console only for VMs; it would be useful to have a new optional parameter to enable also VNC console (disabled by default).
remarks:
2011-Aug-22 11:51:58 by tosky:
Proposed patch: 

diff --git a/src/condor_vm-gahp/libvirt_simple_script.awk b/src/condor_vm-gahp/libvirt_simple_script.awk
index 499e87e..5647728 100644
--- a/src/condor_vm-gahp/libvirt_simple_script.awk
+++ b/src/condor_vm-gahp/libvirt_simple_script.awk
@@ -97,6 +97,10 @@ END {

     print "<devices>" ;
     print "<console type='pty'><source path='/dev/ptmx'/></console>" ;
+    if(attrs["JobVMVNCConsole"] == "true")
+    {
+        print "<graphics type='vnc' port='-1' autoport='yes' keymap='en-us'/>" ;
+    }

     # To see full input ad to script set D_FULLDEBUG
     if(attrs["JobVMNetworking"] == "true")

The prefixes JobVM, VMPARAM and JobVM_ need to go away.
